content.body: So I’m writing the intro of an MDN page for the Paint Timing API and want the intro the put the Paint Timing API on context relative to the Largest Contentful Paint API.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: So I’m writing the intro of an MDN page for the Paint Timing API and want the intro the put the Paint Timing API on context relative to the Largest Contentful Paint API.

content.body: Would it be accurate for me to make it basically say the Largest Contentful Paint API aims to provide timing information that’s more useful in practice, to the point that it obviates need for the Paint Timing API.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Would it be accurate for me to make it basically say the Largest Contentful Paint API aims to provide timing information that’s more useful in practice, to the point that it obviates need for the Paint Timing API.

content.body: In other words, implying (if not explicitly saying) that if you have access to the Largest Contentful Paint timing info, that’s better info and you wouldn’t also have use for knowing when first contentful paint occurred.
